CustomField.description: Id of record override is associated with. I.E. if the id points to a Quote object this would be considered an override "at the quote level". Meaning that the associated override field/value can overwrite on a quote by quote basis.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Id of record override is associated with. I.E. if the id points to a Quote object this would be considered an override "at the quote level". Meaning that the associated override field/value can overwrite on a quote by quote basis.
CustomField.label: Override Record Id
